definition: to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: That's especially true if your employer maintains an on-site charging station.
sentences.chinese: 當你老闆配備了一臺一站式充電站時更是如此。

sentences.english: You have to charge it often.
Soviet Reactors can be overcharged, but will cause it to take damage.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯的反應堆可過量充電，但會受損。

sentences.english: The power will be fed to phone-charging stations, or to lighting and electronic advertising.
sentences.chinese: 這些電將用於手機充電站，或燈光廣告等處。

sentences.english: Some electronic load has an extra function of supply countercurrent.
sentences.chinese: 有些電子負載還具有反向充電的特殊作用。

sentences.english: Find ways to relax and recharge your batteries.
sentences.chinese: 想辦法讓自己輕鬆一點並適時的充充電。

sentences.english: Charge curve and the electric parameter of battery measure up the nominal amount.
sentences.chinese: 充電曲線，電池各電氣參數能夠達到標稱值。

sentences.english: Based on the above, the four-stage charging program is got.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出本充電器所採用的四階段充電方案。

sentences.english: Based on the above, the four-stage charging program is got.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出本充電器所採用的四階段充電方案。

sentences.english: Each came equipped with a charger that plugs into an electrical outlet.
sentences.chinese: 每一個機件都裝有一個可插入電源插口的充電器。

sentences.english: The battery would expose as being overcharged.
sentences.chinese: 電池充電過度可能會發生爆裂。

sentences.english: This thesis mainly proposed the research on fast-charging method of lead-acid battery.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要對鉛酸蓄電池的快速充電問題進行了研究。

sentences.english: Pick up a battery recharger and an extra set of NiMH batteries.
sentences.chinese: 最好挑選一個電池充電器和一套特優的鎳氫電池組。

sentences.english: The charging cradle will get warn, this is normal with induction charging.
sentences.chinese: 在充電期間，發射板感應區會有發熱屬正常現象。

sentences.english: An equation for calculating the input capacity during constant-voltage charging process is also derived.
sentences.chinese: 推導出了恆壓充電過程充電量的計算公式。

definition: to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
quantity of electric charge or current
at any time/at all times/at the right time
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
